# Government Tender Announcement: LANTRONIX CONSOLE SERVER UPGRADE

## [Contracting Entity Information](#contracting-entity-info)

- **Contractor:** Shared Services Canada
- **Contact Name:** Song Prak
- **Phone:** 343-550-5592
- **Fax:** 613-355-7651
- **Email:** (No email address provided)
- **Address:** 180 Kent St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B6, Canada

## [Tender Details](#tender-details)

- **Title:** Solicitation Lantronix BPM 020841 or Equivalent RFQ R000157082 En
- **Publication Date:** 2024-02-14
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-23T16:00:00 (Expired)
- **Notice URL:** (No URL provided)

## [Description of the Requirement](#requirement-description)

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) Solicitation LANTRONIX CONSOLE SERVER UPGRADE is a procurement contract aimed at supporting the International Support Operations initiative by replacing defective LANTRONIX CONSOLE servers at various embassies. The LANTRONIX equipment will facilitate and ensure remote deployment of network devices. To maintain consistency, it is essential to have a standard configuration at all embassies.

## [Contracting Entity and End User Information](#contracting-entity-and-end-user-info)

- **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
- **End User Entity:** Shared Services Canada
- **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

## [GSIN Code and Description](#gsin-code-description)

The procurement falls under the GSIN code JX7025EA. The GSIN description in English is "Local Area Networks, Systems and Components - Maintenance." The equivalent GSIN description in French is "Réseaux locaux, systèmes et composants - entretien."

## [Procedure of Tendering](#tendering-procedure)

The procedure followed in this procurement is competitive, open bidding.

## [Notice Type and Solicitation Details](#notice-type-solicitation)

- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services for information technology (GD) - Standardized Goods
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Trade Pricing Method:** Trade pricing;
